channel.title: At the risk of sounding stupid
channel.description: I am having a problem getting PvP on the server im coding, Basicly i want everything pvp with a few safe zones. if any of you can help please add jonathanhubel28@msn.com or leave a reply or pm me. Thanks Sincerely King tren

item.title: At the risk of sounding stupid
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

public boolean PVP() {
if(absX >= # && absX <= # && absY >= # && absY <= #) {
return false;
} else {
return true;
}
}

Basically if you are in that coord range it returns false, otherwise everywhere else is true.

if(!PVP()) {
sendMessage(“THIS PLAYER NOT IN THE PVP ZONE SON.”);
return;
}

Read full topic
